channel.title: fail to download via tor-download
channel.description:
Greetings,
Here is the message I recieved after I tried to manual update the browser in my WS.
ERROR: Failed to download: torproject
- The download server is down. - File size exceeded (endless data attack triggered). - Tor Browser Downloader (by Whonix developers) has been broken due to upstream changes. Recommendations:
- Try again later. If the error persists it probably won't solve itself before the next update. - Check News: - Manually update: (Debugging information: curl_status_message: [22] - [HTTP page not retrieved. The requested url was not found or returned another error with the HTTP error code being 400 or above. This return code only appears if -f, --fail is used.])
Is this common or is there a method to isolate the issue?
Thanks,

item.title: fail to download via tor-download
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Please don’t write “Tor” when you mean “Tor Browser” to avoid confusion.

Well, that text you copied from is already showing various
recommendations. Try these?

Read full topic

item.title: fail to download via tor-download
item.dc:creator: Fost
item.description:
Greetings,

Here is the message I recieved after I tried to manual update the browser in my WS.

ERROR: Failed to download: torproject

  • The download server is down.

  • File size exceeded (endless data attack triggered).

  • Tor Browser Downloader (by Whonix developers) has been broken due to upstream changes.
    Recommendations:

  • Try again later. If the error persists it probably won’t solve itself before the next update.

  • Check News:

  • Manually update:
    (Debugging information: curl_status_message: [22] - [HTTP page not retrieved. The requested url was not found or returned another error with the HTTP error code being 400 or above. This return code only appears if -f, --fail is used.])

Is this common or is there a method to isolate the issue?

Thanks,

Read full topic
